sentence.Network_en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentence.Network_en: "One thing you can never insure against is corruption among your staff."—"Agreed."
sentence.Network_cn: “永远也防不胜防的就是员工内部的贪污腐败。”——“同意。”

sentence.Network_en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

list.abs: Then put your ear on the table and tap again ., 然后把你的耳朵靠在桌子上 , 再次敲桌子.
Because she was deaf in one ear , she was hard of hearing ., 因为她有一只耳朵聋了 , 所以听力不佳.
People cannot hear well using only one ear ., 人不能听到的 , 以及只用一个耳朵.
顺便提一句，oe2完全是压在耳朵上的（on ear），但是折叠方便，还有个硬壳子。 Ae2是罩耳的（around ear） 跟个袋子没盒子。
贴耳式 (On ear) 的设计配合高级记忆耳垫，可让佩戴更舒适具有丰富时常感的金属质感设计。

auth_sentence.content: It will be shown on BBC One this autumn.
auth_sentence.res_content: It will be shown on BBC One this autumn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It will be shown on BBC One this autumn.

auth_sentence.content: There is one problem with this approach, though.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is one problem with this approach, though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is one problem with this approach, though.

auth_sentence.content: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.
